page.title: 17HOBBIES
page.content: {Pets}are a kind of hobby.This is because you have to look after and care for your pet.A popular pet for older people is a{budgerigar }or a {canary.}Another popular pet for old people is a cat.{Dogs}are very energetic pets.They need a lot of exercise and cost quite a sum of money to keep.The smaller animals are much cheaper to look after.There are animals like {gerbils,hampsters}and even{white mice.}To keep a pet you need a certain number of things to keep it healthy.For a small pet like above ,you need a cage , food and water . For cats and dogs all you need is food , water and a place to sleep. Animals,like cats and dogs, need to sleep in a warm place .Cats are usually left to sleep anywhere but dogs usually sleep in a kennel or in a basket.
